snippet.title: Phantom Crash: Blue Skies Bring Tears - Official Trailer 1
snippet.description:
This was the VERY FIRST video game trailer that I've ever created and it is still surprising that my very first trailer was officially released worldwide to all media channels.
 
Phantom Crash was launched worldwide back in 2002 for the Xbox console and it sold reasonably well for a niche western market genre.  I really enjoyed devising and executing the PR & Marketing for Phantom Crash.  It's also ironic that this trailer was the landmark for many trailers and marketing campaigns planned, produced and executed by me.  

Please check out the rest of my trailers that I've created by going to my video page.
